By default, the extrusion method is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MeshResource/ShapeExtrusionOptions/ExtrusionMethod-swift.enum/linear(depth:)], with a depth of 0.25m, and all sides are assigned the first material.

# init()

**Initializer**

Creates the shape extrusion options with default values.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

By default, the extrusion method is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MeshResource/ShapeExtrusionOptions/ExtrusionMethod-swift.enum/linear(depth:)], with a depth of 0.25m, and all sides are assigned the first material.
title: init()
